pages.title: Performance
pages.description: Mechanisms to harness available power (memory, computation, rendering).

pages.title: Rendering
pages.description: Features needed to render the game's user interface and audio environment.

pages.title: User Interaction
pages.description: Features needed to engage the user through device-specific interaction mechanisms and guarantee the accessibility of these interactions.

pages.title: Network and Communications
pages.description: Interactions with the network to fetch resources and communicate between peers, e.g. to enable multi-player games.

pages.title: Platform Integration
pages.description: Mechanisms to integrate the application with the rest of the system and provide a native-like experience.

pages.title: Data Storage
pages.description: Technologies available to save state and game assets.

pages.title: Payment and Services
pages.description: Features needed to monetize a game, e.g. by integrating easy-to-use in-app purchases.
